name: Hell Kicker
description:
welcome to the world of HELL KICKER, made for a game by it's cover 2018

a sketch, a rough draft, a pre-alpha of a fighting game set in the colorful 'HELL'.  This demo version features only Player-VS-CPU mode, and just one playable character: Lacey Killbottom.

Controls (CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED):
Left Stick = move

A = jump

X = light Kick

Y = heavy Kick

B = dodgeroll
---

pc controlls:

arrow keys = move

space = jump

X = light Kick

Z = heavy Kick

shift = dodgeroll
